resources.string: This page will allow you to quickly access all your stored stops.\n\nSwipe left to remove a stop, tap the add button to register a new stop.
Search for a specific stop by typing in its name or a part of its name.\n\nTap the stop you would like to register on the landing page.

Click the filter toolbar button to select which departures to show.

Pull the list down to perform a refresh of the departures.

Tap a departure to see detailed journey information
